Text:
This isn't a retail rip. It has an edited title menu with a stupid little kid photoshopped into a bunch of publicity shots at the end if you let the title screen run long enough.

Also the video has his name and website advertised along the bottom which displays at the start of every episode.
its an HQ DVD......only got a title of 40sec that runs before the start of the movie.............its good
